From: richard f allen <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

The doors to the CR chamber open, as Hot Rod steps out.
"Aww. That feels better."
Hot Rod walks out front the ship, to join the other bots waiting for the
Pred's.
"Hey, everyone."
Hot Rod activates his comlink.
"Does any Maximal have a Pred on there sensors? I feel like blowing some
Pred's back to the pit!"
